Появился в квартире. Хотел заварить чай, но какой-то у*бан начал командовать. После я уснул на кровати, а как проснулся увидел шарообразную х*йню с синим глазом. Он заставил проходить какие-то всратые испытания. В конце я его трахнул и он улетел в космос.
100 шарообразных у*банов из 10

Одним словом - шедевр! Отличный сюжет, головоломки, которые заставят вас задуматься над их решением, хорошая графика, которая запускается на любом компьютере, да и в принципе игра очень душевная, по настоящему чувствуется что в игру вложили много усилий. Хоть я и понимаю что об этой игре уже все сказали, но мне всё равно захотелось упомянуть об одной из моих любимых игр.

I beat this game 3 times at the moment I'm writing this, and here is why this is the best game I have played so far, at least in my opinion:
For a game made in 2011, the graphics hold up really well
It has a lot of funny moments, it has a good storytelling
The puzzles never really get boring, they're not too easy, and they're not too hard.
I really like the fact that you can play community-made chambers and also make your own, it's a sort of endless mode, though community-made chambers are not as fun as the official ones, the story mode is the gem of this game.
There's a feature that lets you speedrun some parts of the game and compare it to your friends' highscores, it's perfect for when you're really bored of playing the game normally

On the other hand, there are the Coop chambers, although they're not as fun as the story mode chambers, the company of a friend is what saves it, and it also makes this game a lot better, since you can always hop on with a friend and try to solve the puzzle you couldn't solve 10 months ago
lovely mechanic UK ball, lovely memories
Such a funny game and mindblowing concept.

сюжет в краце в диалогах:

пробуждение 9999999 лет- встреча с уитли - включение гладос -напоминания об концовке 1 части - гибербулинг от гладес - пеобег от гладес- вредим гладес  - захват управления самим уитли - прошлое компании амперчур - воспоминание гладес - кибербулинк месте гладес против уитли (подгатовка) - тот момент где нас убивают - побег с гладес от уитли- полная разруха и (подготовка) - побеждаем уитли - возрощаем контроль гладес - хор турелей - выход на поверхность (возможно это ложь)

This thing's like $1 every time it's on sale. Totally worth it.

This game is a masterpiece. If you haven't played the Portal series you are missing a lot. Especially this second game is literally one of the best game experiences in my life. Funny dialogue, story, music, good gameplay, actually hard puzzles, great graphics (even to this day), coop, community's own chambers and just everything about this game is pure gold. 

Also the way they announced this game was really cool. Updating the first game and putting secret codes that reveal secret websites and a huge ARG is just a really genius way to reveal a new game and it fits the game story and just over all the whole series's feeling very well. 

If you haven't played this and or you're sceptical just buy it from a Sale or something. It literally costs just like a couple of bucks on sale and it is still 200% worth it with full price.
Je to dobrá hra hlavně pro přemýšlení

还是起源一的引擎，但是渲染效果明显比前作传送门一要好太多，更加的写实，脱离了半条命2那种昏暗的感觉。G胖不数三，也不指望有传送门3，毕竟和半条命扯上了关系，时间线在半条命2的后面，起码证明地球没被联合帝国毁灭，但是有一关会听到联合军火车的声音，说明联合军也没被彻底赶走。如果真逃出去了，看到地表的景象就差不多说出了半条命第二章之后又发生了什么。与其去构思怎么去续写故事，G胖选择摆烂，除非哪天出来个抉择果断的人，不然现在的V社根本就不想启封这个IP。
别看了，赶紧买吧，价格翻倍都是血赚（不过建议先看看视频看自己晕不晕）

Might just be the best game that has ever been made from start to finish.
It's all executed perfectly. The small things someone can find and critique is part of the art of Portal, and hence just validates the game even more. Portal 1 and 2 ties together so well that the series is elevated to a multitude of levels above it's already independent brilliance. The only thing I find myself regretting in this paradise of an intriguing story, is my inability to fully enjoy it from the beginning. 

Note: I did go into this game completely blind. I had actually forgotten the famous line 'the cake is a lie' in portal 1 (though, I did discover it in the easter eggs anyway). I purposely distanced myself from the game because I knew I'd play it at some point. In my childhood I had tried the co-op mode many years ago, so from there I knew. My play-count hours are mostly from playing community maps and co-op after the initial story. I love portal.

If there ever would be a portal 3, it doesn't have to be about Chell. I just want to experience the incredible mix of narrative, humour and execution of brilliance again in a different format. Perhaps the three-way-portal device Wheatley pointed out in "the part where he kills you" that Portal Reloaded (community made game) seems to have incorporated. Anything. Just more portal. More Half-Life Aperture Science universe.
GLaDOS still hasn't given me my cake :(
